casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Solomon, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Solomon (1994), 71 Ohio St.3d 350.]

(No. 94-2055 Submitted November 29, 1994 Decided December 23, 1994.) Mathias H. Heck, Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Carley J. Ingram, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. John C. Solomon, pro se. Per Curiam.

For the reasons stated in the opinion of the court of appeals, that court’s judgment is affirmed.

Judgment affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., A.W. Sweeney, Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney and Pfeifer, JJ., concur. ■
